content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Isabelle/878a67422fb4 updates scala-3.3.4 LTS to scala-3.3.5 LTS.

This is shortly after Isabelle2025-RC1: I did not risk a last-minute change of
plans, because the Scala guys often produce rather weak releases. Hopefully
the new LTS scheme improves on that culture.

Makarius

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>

No, it didn't. See now:

changeset: 82136:a43e39c52f26
user: wenzelm
date: Wed Feb 12 00:53:15 2025 +0100
files: Admin/components/main src/Pure/ROOT.ML src/Pure/ROOT.scala
description:
back to scala-3.3.4: scalac in 3.3.5 is more than 2 times slower;

I tried to find out the reason for this slowdown, but did not succeed --- even
after systematic web search for "bugs" and "fixes".

Makarius
